Following a review of existing studies and in combination with our own clinical knowledge,
15 we chose to use the CHM formulation Sheng-Yu-Tang (聖愈湯, SYT; Table 1), which was administered without a personalized diagnosis. This formula is fairly simple (6 ingredients) and is composed of herbs that have been extensively studied. Moreover, and as explained in our previous publication, this formula embodies the core treatment strategy that seems to be ideal in the vast majority of post-HSCT patients from a Chinese medicine perspective.
